page.title: 16Attitudes in Thornton Area
page.content: {Public transport}does not meet the needs of those residents who do not own cars. Too few drivers use the car-park and so streets become congested and the original peace of the village is destroyed.Residents are also concerned about the sapling outside Baldersons' Cafe. This was planted to replace the original, diseased tree, but now over-hangs the road. {Tourism.}Residents feel the Thatch Cottage should be open to the public.Others think there are too many souvenir shops in the area. {Shops.}The opening of a new supermarket has already led to the closure of one of the two supermarkets.
